properties.Name: ProductItemQuantity
properties.Description:
Indicates the number of an item (SKU) that are contained within a single Product. Used primarily for statistical purposes.

Note: While start and end dates are included it should be noted that any change in the quantity of product items would necessitate a change in GTIN, UPC, etc. and would therefore require a new product id.

Note: This only contains base product items and does not included any packaging.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: ItemSku
Columns.Description: The Stock Keeping Unit identifier, which is typically used for inventory-related activities.

Columns.Name: ProductItemQuantityStartDate
Columns.Description: The effective start date or first date that the Product Item Quantity is in effect.

Columns.Name: ProductItemQuantityEndDate
Columns.Description: The effective end date or last date that the Product Item Quantity is in effect.

Columns.Name: ProductItemQuantity
Columns.Description: The number of items contained in a product.

Columns.Name: UnitOfMeasureId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Unit Of Measure.

Columns.Name: ProductItemQuantityNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the product item quantity.
